desc: Initial release of KL's terminology IG. It replicates the CodeSystems and ValueSets earlier maintained in FKI/kl-core, with the exception that most Valuesets have now been intesionally defined (using rules) rather than explicitely.
title: KLTerm
introduction: This IG includes CodeSystems and ValueSets defined by KL/Local Government Denmark used in KL's FHIR standards.
